Included DLCs :

DLC 1 - The Witcher 3: Temerian Armor Set - Set temerskih armor - such armor can only wear the best warriors Temeria. The set includes jacket, gloves, pants, boots and harnesses for horses.
DLC 2 - The Witcher 3: Beard and Hairstyle Set - A set of haircuts for hair and beard - change the appearance of Geralt of Rivia as you like, with this great set of beards and hair.
DLC 3 - The Witcher 3: Contract Missing Miners - new job - Bookings: the missing miners - in a tiny village on the Skellig miners began to disappear. Find out what's going on! The quest "Missing Miners': will be held near the small village on the Skellig.
DLC 4 - The Witcher 3: Alternative Look for Yennefer - An alternative way Yennifer - admire the new look of the powerful sorceress Yennifer Vengerberga! New image Yennifer can be included in the game settings, in the "Downloadable Content".
5 DLC - The Witcher 3: Nilfgaardian Armor Set - Set Nilfgaardskoy Armor.
6 DLC - The Witcher 3: Elite Crossbow Set - Elite range of crossbows for Geralt.
DLC 7 - The Witcher 3: New Quest 'Fool's Gold' - New Quest - fool's gold.
8 DLC - The Witcher 3: 'Ballad Heroes' Neutral Gwent Card Set - A set of neutral cards to play in Gvint - Heroes ballads.
9 DLC - The Witcher 3: Alternative Look for Triss - look for alternative Triss Merigold.
10 DLC - The Witcher 3: New Quest - Scavenger Hunt: Wolf School Gear - Chain missions "Witchers ancient wolf School + EquipmentÂ»
11 DLC - The Witcher 3: Skellige Armor set - Set skelligskih armor for Geralt and his horse.
12 DLC - The Witcher 3: Skellige's Most Wanted contract - Quest "The most dangerous criminal Skellig"
13 DLC - The Witcher 3: Where the Cat and Wolf Play ... - Setting "Where The Cat and the wolf to play ...". "Explore the abandoned village and her terrible secret. Do you recognize that massacred and use their skills vedmachi during clashes with this mysterious force." The contract for the quest can be obtained in the village Oreton in Velenje.
14 DLC - The Witcher 3: Alternative Look for Ciri - new suit for CRIS.
15 DLC - The Witcher 3: New Finisher Animations - New finishing.
16 DLC - The Witcher 3: New game + 
17 DLC - The Witcher 3: Stone Hearts 
18 DLC - The Witcher 3: Blood and wine

NOTE: This repack will be fully compatible with future GOG updates , you can manually apply the GOG updates yourself .....

**INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS:

Open 'The Witcher 3 v1.22 + 18 DLCs repack Mr DJ.part01' , wait for around 1 or 2 minutes for self extractor to open, specify the directory where u want to extract the setup folder, open the extracted folder.....
 OR
Extract it yourself by opening any other part using 'WinRAR', open the extracted folder....

Ensure about 45gb free in C:/ drive (temporary) required for unpacking ....

DISABLE YOUR ANTIVIRUS BEFORE RUNNING 'Setup.exe' (IMPORTANT) to avoid any error message . (For avast users: Just Disable DeepScreen in antivirus settings)...

After running setup,, click on 'Configure',, specify the install directory,, click on next and next,, select the necessary software (Direct X , Visual C++ updates [provided in Redist folder]),, again next,, finally on 'Install'...PLAY THE GAME FROM DESKTOP SHORTCUT using run as administrator.... 

Always open the game using 'Run as administrator' to avoid any savegame/crash issue, if it still crashes, lower the graphics settings and make sure u meet the system requirements along with updated graphic drivers for your graphics card...

To avoid ISDone.dll/Unarc.dll decompression error , do this :
Force recheck the torrent in utorrent first , make sure you're not low on space in C: drive (around 45 GB temporary free space will be good ) , Press Windows key, type %temp% and hit enter , delete all the files present in it , disable your antivirus and open setup using run as administrator otherwise just install it in in SAFEMODE to avoid background Microsoft services from interfering ...
